body: I've been noticing in the last couple of days that the McZone servers (and the Nebula01 etc. servers for that matter) are constantly offline, as is Apollo. Any reasons for this?
body_tagged: I've been noticing in the last couple of days that the McZone servers (and the Nebula01 etc. servers for that matter) are constantly offline, as is Apollo. Any reasons for this?
title: McZone servers not up?

replies.body:
I noticed this too. I heard it was because IvyCode's stripper club isn't making enough money for him to run the server.
Source: teamspeak
